mapper.select: SELECT TEL_SEQ,ID_U,ID_D,RESERV_DATE,DX_NAME,DX_CONTENT,PURPOSE,REMARKS,ISS_DATE FROM TEL_RESULT JOIN TELEMEDICINE USING(TEL_SEQ) WHERE ID_U = #{id_u}

SELECT TEL_SEQ, ID_U,ID_D,RESERV_DATE,DX_NAME,DX_CONTENT,PURPOSE,REMARKS,ISS_DATE,TEL_RESULT.CHECKD FROM TEL_RESULT JOIN TELEMEDICINE USING(TEL_SEQ) WHERE TEL_SEQ = #{tel_seq} AND TEL_RESULT.CHECKD = 'Y'
